data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Lake Albert, Uganda a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lake Albert, Uganda
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Lake Albert do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Lake Albert, Uganda find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, if there is even one of the 2,055 believers in Lake Albert, Uganda who does not have a Bible, please provide them one today.
Jesus, call those who are far off in Lake Albert, Uganda, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 2,055 believers in the state of Lake Albert to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.section_summary:
the state of Lake Albert, Uganda has a population of 6,200.

We estimate Lake Albert has 2,055 people who might know Jesus, 3,096 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,049 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 2,055 believers in Lake Albert to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
